name: Top Superbikes Racing . Free Furious Motorcycle Races Game for Kids
name_original: Top Superbikes Racing . Free Furious Motorcycle Races Game for Kids
description:
◉◉ Top Superbikes Racing ◉◉

◉◉ Free Furious Motorcycle Races Game for Kids ◉◉

Prepare to survive in an illegal night Moto GP Race!

Drive through a city full of skyscrapers while dodging rivals and going always faster!

Concentration and high skill are paramount to go far in this Superbikes racing game.

Choose from four realistic bikes and try to become the Moto GP champion in the worldwide leaderboard!

Dodge all the Superbikes that come to you! Keep your achievements bar in green so that your game does not end!

If you want to go faster because you like high speeds just press the screen! The controls are very simple, just tilt your device to control your superbike!

The more distance you survive the more you'll want to continue! Show to others that Moto GP competitions are made for you!

Put on your helmet and win all your friends!

Features of this realistic Superbikes Racing game:

◉ Night landscape!
◉ Great and fast GP Superbikes!
◉ Easy controls!
◉ Realistic graphics!
◉ Leader Boards!
◉ Funny music!
◉ Free!

The game is waiting in the app store so you can enjoy and have fun driving real GP Motorcycles!

Please leave us reviews about any improvements or ideas! We try to answer to everyone because your opinion is very important to us!

Can't you hear the roar of the Superbikes awaiting for you? Prove you're a real winner and drive as no one can. The asphalt is made for the brave!
